alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:11AM CDT until October 24 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MOWER AND SOUTHERN DODGE COUNTIES... At 109 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was approaching Hayfield, about 8 miles south of Dodge Center, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Could cause light damage to items. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Mower and southern Dodge Counties, including the following locations... Oslo, County Roads 6 And 15, County Roads 6 And 9, County Roads 5 And 6, Highway 56 And County 6, Graves Landing Field, and Waltham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Remain indoors as these storms cross the area overnight.
